scripts.dev: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && nodemon index.js
scripts.node_1: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && nodemon --watch src -e js src/NetworkNode.js 5555 http://localhost:5555
scripts.node_2: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && nodemon --watch src -e js src/NetworkNode.js 5556 http://localhost:5556
scripts.node_3: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && nodemon --watch src -e js src/NetworkNode.js 5557 http://localhost:5557
scripts.node_4: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && nodemon --watch src -e js src/NetworkNode.js 5558 http://localhost:5558
scripts.node_5: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && nodemon --watch src -e js src/NetworkNode.js 5559 http://localhost:5559
scripts.build-client: npm run clean && parcel build client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client: npm run clean && parcel client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
